title: Подростки в космосе
overview: The year is 2054. The Earth is literally suffocating: due to environmental problems, the average age of the population is rapidly decreasing. Teenagers can save the situation - the only ones who are physically capable of going into space and finding a unique substance to prevent a catastrophe. Of the 13 daredevils, each with their own personal motives, only six will make it onto the crew.
